text: 28 Squadron SAAF is a squadron of the South African Air Force. It is currently a medium transport squadron flying Lockheed C-130BZ Hercules medium transport aircraft. * First formed: 1 June 1943 (At Almaza, Egypt.) The squadron flew Dakota DC3's as part of No. 216 Group RAF of the Mediterranean Allied Air Forces in May 1945 ==Aircraft== ==References== Category:Squadrons of the South African Air Force Category:Military units and formations established in 1943
title: 28 Squadron SAAF
